AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: khornegor
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A gor that has been gifted by the Lord Khorne. They're better fighters than regular gor, and are revered amongst their kin for their skills and savagery in battle.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: pestigor
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A gor that has been blessed by Papa Nurgle. They're better fighters than regular gor, tend to recover from injuries and disease faster than most.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: slaangor
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A gor that has received the charms of Slaanesh. They're better fighters than regular gor, and are revered amongst their kin for their speed and skill.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: tzaangor
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A gor that has received the power and blessing of Tzeentch. They're better fighters than regular gor, and are revered amongst their kin for their magical potential and skills.
